> **Letter dated: 3:14 AM**  
> **Typed. Deleted. Rewritten. Never sent.**  
>  
> *Subject line (unsaved): "If You Read This, Just Know..."*

---

**Hey.**

I know I‚Äôm probably the last person you wanna hear from.  
I wouldn‚Äôt blame you if you blocked this before even finishing it.

I‚Äôve started this message like ten times. It never sounds right.  
You always had that way of saying exactly what you meant.  
I never could.

So let me try now.

---

**I messed up.**  
That part‚Äôs easy to say.  
What‚Äôs hard is saying I knew I was messing up *while I was doing it.*  
You were too patient with me.  
Too understanding.  
And I took that for granted. Not because I didn‚Äôt see it‚Äî  
But because I didn‚Äôt think you‚Äôd actually walk away.

You always forgave me.  
Until you didn‚Äôt.  
And that silence?  
It‚Äôs louder than every argument we ever had.

---

I said some things to hurt you.  
To push you.  
To pull you back.

I thought if I could get you mad enough, you'd stay engaged.  
But all I did was make you tired.  
And eventually, you got quiet.  
That‚Äôs when I knew you were done.

---

**You were the only person who saw the broken parts of me and didn‚Äôt flinch.**  
And I punished you for it.  
Because I hated those parts.  
And I couldn‚Äôt understand why you didn‚Äôt.

Now you‚Äôre gone.  
And I get it.  
I get all of it.

---

If you ever wonder if I care:  
Yes.  
If you ever wonder if I look at my phone, hoping something from you pops up:  
Every day.  
If you ever wonder if I finally understand what I lost:  
I do.  
And it keeps me up at night.  
Just like this letter I‚Äôll never send.

Because what I want doesn‚Äôt matter anymore.  
What you deserve does.  
And it‚Äôs not this.

I hope you're smiling again.  
I hope you're loved the way you should‚Äôve been‚Äîwithout having to fight for it.  
And I hope you never think it was your fault.  
Not for one second.

You were too much, yes.  
But in all the ways I wasn‚Äôt enough.

‚Äì Me  
(Still typing, but not sending)
